name: Clean Userstyles 2015
description:
This style changes the look of userstyles.org.
This style makes userstyles.org flatter, easier to read and more modern.
additional_info:
Apr 17 2017 | This style is no longer being actively maintained. VERSION: 1.0.0 CHANGELOG: v1.0.0 | Dec 12 2015
  • First release of this style
Feel free to leave feedback, as it is much appreciated.
